grad_quotes.quote: There are still many causes worth sacrificing for, so much history yet to be made.
grad_quotes.author: Michelle Obama

grad_quotes.quote: I am never wrong when it comes to my own possibilities.
grad_quotes.author: Placido Domingo

grad_quotes.quote: Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life.
grad_quotes.author: Steve Jobs

grad_quotes.quote: When I let go of what I am, I become what I might be.
grad_quotes.author: Lao Tzu

grad_quotes.quote: Find out what you like doing best and get someone to pay you for it.
grad_quotes.author: Katharine Whitehorn

grad_quotes.quote: Success is peace of mind, which is a direct result of self-satisfaction in knowing you made the effort to become the best of which you are capable.
grad_quotes.author: John Wooden

grad_quotes.quote: When we do the best we can, we never know what miracle is wrought in our life, or in the life of another.
grad_quotes.author: Helen Keller

grad_quotes.quote: We are not what we know but what we are willing to learn
grad_quotes.author: Mary Catherine Bateson

grad_quotes.quote: Don't judge each day by the harvest you reap, but by the seeds that you plant.
grad_quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

grad_quotes.quote: The thing that is really hard, and really amazing, is givings up on being perfect and beginning the work of becoming yourself.
grad_quotes.author: Anna Quindlen

grad_quotes.quote: We cannot do great things on this earth - only small things with great love.
grad_quotes.author: Mother Teresa

grad_quotes.quote: No matter what age you are, or what your circumstances might be, you are special, and you still have something unique to offer. Your life, because of who you are has meaning.
grad_quotes.author: Barbara De Angelis

grad_quotes.quote: One lives in the hope of becoming a memory.
grad_quotes.author: Antonio Porchia

grad_quotes.quote: Just don't give up trying to do what you really want to do. Where there is love and inspiration, I don't think you can go wrong.
grad_quotes.author: Ella Fitzgerald

grad_quotes.quote: It's your place in the world; it's your life. Go on and do all you can with it, and make it the life you want to live.
grad_quotes.author: Mae Jemison

grad_quotes.quote: There is a crack in everything. That's how the light gets in.
grad_quotes.author: Leonard Cohen

grad_quotes.quote: I am in the world to change the world.
grad_quotes.author: Kathe Kollwitz

grad_quotes.quote: Don't try to figure out what other people want to hear from you; figure out what you have to say. It's the one and only thing you have to offer.
grad_quotes.author: Barbara Kingsolver

grad_quotes.quote: It's only those who do nothing who make no mistakes.
grad_quotes.author: Joseph Conrad

grad_quotes.quote: We know what we are, but know not what we may be.
grad_quotes.author: William Shakespeare

grad_quotes.quote: The important work of moving the world forward does not wait to be done by perfect men.
grad_quotes.author: George Elliot

grad_quotes.quote: Hold fast to dreams for if dreams die life is a broken-winged bird that cannot fly.
grad_quotes.author: Langston Hughes

grad_quotes.quote: Imagination is more important than knowledge.
grad_quotes.author: Albert Einstein

grad_quotes.quote: Life isn't about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself.
grad_quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

grad_quotes.quote: Fortune favours the bold
grad_quotes.author: Terence

grad_quotes.quote: He has not learned the lesson of life who does not every day surmount a fear.
grad_quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

grad_quotes.quote: The life you have led doesn't need to be the only life you have.
grad_quotes.author: Anna Qunidlen

grad_quotes.quote: A ship is safe in the harbour, but that is not what ships are for.
grad_quotes.author: William Greenough Thayer

grad_quotes.quote: Change is not merely necessary to life - it is life.
grad_quotes.author: Alvin Toffler

grad_quotes.quote: We must be willing to let go of the life we have planned, so as to have the life that is waiting for us.
grad_quotes.author: E.M. Forster

grad_quotes.quote: The misfortunes hardest to bear are those which never happen.
grad_quotes.author: James Russell Lowell

grad_quotes.quote: I see my paths, but I don't know where it leads. Not knowing where I'm going is what inspires me to travel it.
grad_quotes.author: Rosalia de Castro

grad_quotes.quote: Confusion is the beginning of wisdom
grad_quotes.author: Socrates

grad_quotes.quote: We must sail sometimes with the wind and sometimes against it - but we must sail, and not drift, nor lie at anchor.
grad_quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes Jr.

grad_quotes.quote: Nought may endure but mutability.
grad_quotes.author: Percy Bysshe Shelley

grad_quotes.quote: If you do not expect the unexpected you wil not find it, for it is not to be reached by search or trail.
grad_quotes.author: Heraclitus

grad_quotes.quote: I'm not afraid of storms, for I'm learning to sail my ship.
grad_quotes.author: Louisa May Alcott

grad_quotes.quote: Life is not measured by the number of breaths we take, but by the moments that take our breath away.
grad_quotes.author: Maya Angelou

grad_quotes.quote: The more things you do, the more you can do.
grad_quotes.author: Lucille Ball

grad_quotes.quote: There is nothing like a dream to create the future.
grad_quotes.author: Victor Hugo

grad_quotes.quote: The question isn't who's going to let me; it's who's going to stop me?
grad_quotes.author: Ayn Rand

grad_quotes.quote: The greatest gift is not being afraid to question.
grad_quotes.author: Ruby Dee

grad_quotes.quote: Nothing will ever be attempted if all possible objections must first be overcome.
grad_quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

grad_quotes.quote: You have no security unless you can live bravely, excitingly, imaginatively; unless you can choose a challenge instead of competence.
grad_quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

grad_quotes.quote: Take chances, make mistakes. That's how you grow. Pain nourishes your courage. You have to fail in order to practice being brave.
grad_quotes.author: Mary Tyler Moore

grad_quotes.quote: Courage is like a muscle. We strengthen it by use.
grad_quotes.author: Ruth Gordon

grad_quotes.quote: As for the future, your task is not to foresee it but to enable it.
grad_quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupery

grad_quotes.quote: You may be disappointed if you fail, but you are doomed if you don't try.
grad_quotes.author: Beverly Sills

grad_quotes.quote: Nothing in life is to be feared. It is only to be understood.
grad_quotes.author: Marie Curie

grad_quotes.quote: Destiny is a name often given in retrospect to choices that had dramatic consequences.
grad_quotes.author: J.K. Rowling

grad_quotes.quote: The universe is change; our life is what our thoughts make it.
grad_quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

grad_quotes.quote: Life begins at the end of your comfort zone.
grad_quotes.author: Neale Donald Walsch

grad_quotes.quote: Opportunity dances with those who are already on the dance floor.
grad_quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown Jr.

grad_quotes.quote: Life shrinks or expands in proportion to one's courage.
grad_quotes.author: Anais Nin

grad_quotes.quote: We must believe that we are gifted for something, and that this thing, at whatever cost, must be attained.
grad_quotes.author: Marie Curie

grad_quotes.quote: Either life entails courage, or it ceases to be life.
grad_quotes.author: E.M. Forster

grad_quotes.quote: Never be afraid to fall apart, because it is an opportunity to rebuild yourself the way you wish you had been all along.
grad_quotes.author: Rae Smith

grad_quotes.quote: Optimism is true moral courage.
grad_quotes.author: Ernest Shackleton

grad_quotes.quote: Understand that the right to choose your path is a sacred privilege. Use it. Dwell in possibility.
grad_quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

grad_quotes.quote: The world is a book, and those who do not travel read only a page.
grad_quotes.author: Saint Augustine

grad_quotes.quote: Go and make interesting mistakes, make amazing mistakes, make glorious and fantastic mistakes. Break rules. Leave the world more interesting for your being here.
grad_quotes.author: Neil Gaiman

grad_quotes.quote: Change is the law of life. And those who look only to the past or present are certain to miss the future.
grad_quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

grad_quotes.quote: A goal without a plan is just a wish.
grad_quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupery

grad_quotes.quote: No matter who you are, no matter what you did, no matter where you've come from, you can always change, become a better version of yourself.
grad_quotes.author: Madonna

grad_quotes.quote: Don't underestimate the value of Doing Nothing, of just going along, listening to all the things you can't hear, and not bothering.
grad_quotes.author: A.A. Milne

grad_quotes.quote: A quiet mind cureth all.
grad_quotes.author: Robert Burton

grad_quotes.quote: Research is what I'm doing when I don't know what I'm doing.
grad_quotes.author: Wernher von Braun

grad_quotes.quote: I like work: it fascinates me. I can sit and look at it for hours.
grad_quotes.author: Jerome K. Jerome

grad_quotes.quote: The world is full of magical things patiently waiting for our wits to grow sharper.
grad_quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

grad_quotes.quote: My mind's my kingdom.
grad_quotes.author: Francis Quarles

grad_quotes.quote: As I get older I notice the years less and the seasons more.
grad_quotes.author: John Hubbard

grad_quotes.quote: The soul's joy lies in doing.
grad_quotes.author: Percy Bysshe Shelley

grad_quotes.quote: We usually find that it is the simplest things - not the great occasions - that in retrospect give off the greatest glow of happiness.
grad_quotes.author: Bob Hope

grad_quotes.quote: Wisdom begins in wonder.
grad_quotes.author: Socrates

grad_quotes.quote: The time you enjoy wasting is not wasted time.
grad_quotes.author: John Lennon

grad_quotes.quote: I long to accomplish a great and noble taks; but my chief duty is to accomplish small tasks as if they were great and noble.
grad_quotes.author: Helen Keller

celebration_quotes.quote: The more you praise and celebrate your life, the more there is in life to celebrate.
celebration_quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

celebration_quotes.quote: Life is too short not to celebrate nice moments
celebration_quotes.author: Jurgen Klopp

celebration_quotes.quote: I celebrate myself, and sing myself.
celebration_quotes.author: Walt Whitman

celebration_quotes.quote: Celebrate yourself . . . and stay positive!
celebration_quotes.author: Khoudia Diop

celebration_quotes.quote: Celebrate life in all its glory - challenge yourself to let the routine sing, and the new dance.
celebration_quotes.author: Maximillian Degenerez

celebration_quotes.quote: The best way to celebrate the holidays is with some delicious food.
celebration_quotes.author: Rachel Hollis

celebration_quotes.quote: Life has sweetness to it and a beauty and a power that I wanted to celebrate.
celebration_quotes.author: Valerie Harper

celebration_quotes.quote: There is never going to be an end point. But definitely, I am happy to complete a certain part of my journey, and that's something I want to celebrate.
celebration_quotes.author: Harshvardhan Rane

celebration_quotes.quote: Age is a case of mind over matter. If you don't mind, it doesn't matter.
celebration_quotes.author: Mark Twain

celebration_quotes.quote: The great thing about getting older is you don't lose all the other ages you've been.
celebration_quotes.author: Madeleine L'Engle

celebration_quotes.quote: Let us never know what old age is. Let us know the happiness time brings, not count the years.
celebration_quotes.author: Decimus Magnus Ausonius

celebration_quotes.quote: With mirth and laughter let old wrinkles come.
celebration_quotes.author: William Shakespeare

celebration_quotes.quote: Whatever with the past has gone, the best is always yet to come.
celebration_quotes.author: Lucy Larcom

celebration_quotes.quote: Every age can be enchanting, provided you live within it.
celebration_quotes.author: Brigitte Bardot

celebration_quotes.quote: How old would you be if you didn't know how old you are?
celebration_quotes.author: Satchel Paige

celebration_quotes.quote: You grow up the day you have the first real laugh at yourself.
celebration_quotes.author: Ethel Barrymore

celebration_quotes.quote: You know you are getting old when the candles cost more than the cake.
celebration_quotes.author: Bob Hope

celebration_quotes.quote: We grow neither better nor worse as we get old, but more like ourselves.
celebration_quotes.author: Bernard Baruch

celebration_quotes.quote: Birthdays are good for you. Statistics show that the people who have the most live the longest.
celebration_quotes.author: Larry Lorenzoni

celebration_quotes.quote: My candle burns at both ends; it will not last the night. But, ah, my foes, and, oh, my friends; it gives a lovely light!
celebration_quotes.author: Edna St. Vincent Millay

celebration_quotes.quote: In childhood, we yearn to be grown ups. In old age, we yearn to be kids. It just seems that all would be wonderful if we didn't have to celebrate our birthdays in chronological order.
celebration_quotes.author: Robert Brault

celebration_quotes.quote: Growing old is mandatory; growing up is optional.
celebration_quotes.author: Chili Davis

celebration_quotes.quote: Count your life by smiles, not tears, count your age by friends, not years.
celebration_quotes.author: John Lennon

celebration_quotes.quote: Years may wrinkle the skin, but to give up enthusiasm wrinkles the soul.
celebration_quotes.author: Samuel Ullman

celebration_quotes.quote: It is not the length of life, but the depth.
celebration_quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

celebration_quotes.quote: And in the end, it's not the years in your life that count. It's the life in your years.
celebration_quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

celebration_quotes.quote: Birthdays are nature's way of telling us to eat more cake.
celebration_quotes.author: Edward Morykwas

celebration_quotes.quote: Each ten years of a man's life has its own fortunes, its own hopes, its own desires.
celebration_quotes.author: Goethe
